Create a new request by class

Source: R/methods_base_request.R
base_request.Rd

Create a new request by class

Usage

base_request(x)

Arguments

x

An object of class care_endpoint, care_group, pro_endpoint, or open_endpoint

Value

A new base request

Examples

care_endpoint("care_enrollees") |> base_request()
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/2457ea29-fc82-48b0-86ec-3b0755de7515/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
pro_endpoint("pdc_affiliations") |> base_request()
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/api/1/datastore/query/27ea-46a8/0?offset=0&count=false&format=json&keys=true&results=true&rowIds=false&schema=false&limit=2000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
open_endpoint("profile_covered") |> base_request()
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/api/1/datastore/query/23160558-6742-54ff-8b9f-cac7d514ff4e/0?offset=0&count=false&format=json&keys=true&results=true&rowIds=false&schema=false&limit=500
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "openpaymentsdata.cms.gov"
caid_endpoint("mlr_summary") |> base_request()
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.medicaid.gov/api/1/datastore/query/743f9f04-4473-41e2-9da2-9a89db65ee55/0?offset=0&count=false&format=json&keys=true&results=true&rowIds=false&schema=false&limit=8000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.medicaid.gov"

care_group("care_hospital") |> base_request()
#> $hospital_owners
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/029c119f-f79c-49be-9100-344d31d10344/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
#> 
#> $hospital_chow
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/c04031db-54ce-461c-85d1-d2613d71f167/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
#> 
#> $hospital_chow_owner
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/60625dc8-b621-45f0-9423-077fd133b13e/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
#> 
#> $hospital_enrollments
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/f6f6505c-e8b0-4d57-b258-e2b94133aaf2/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
#> 
#> $hospital_costreport
#> <httr2_request>
#> GET
#> https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/44060663-47d8-4ced-a115-b53b4c270acb/data-viewer?offset=0&size=5000
#> Body: empty
#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
#>

#> <httr2_request>
#> GET

#> Policies:
#> • throttle_realm: "data.cms.gov"
